title: CAPS WebApp
desc: Led the UX and UI design, and developed the web application for the Society of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists of Canada (SOGC) as part of the CAPS project.

title: ALIVE Investigator
desc: An open world game with feedback variation, developed as part of a research project to observe user inquiry while solving an ecological issue in a virtual environment.

title: FlashoVR
desc: A fire investigation simulator that offers students a 3D serious game format to enhance their training experience and practice investigation skills.

title: The Immitation Game
desc: A Vancouver Artgallery exhibition, for which I coordinated, produced, and sourced digital assets, helped author 2 optical installations, and styled a tooltip for publication.
